hero.title: Start Your Claim in Minutes
hero.subtitle: We are claim adjusters (not emergency services). We handle your damage claims professionally—from first contact to final payout. Vehicle accidents, property damage, personal injury, and more.

faq.question: Do I need evidence to start?
faq.answer: You can submit without evidence, but outcomes are faster with receipts/photos. Add now or later.

faq.question: How fast do you respond?
faq.answer: We target under 24h for new claims. SLA appears in your timeline.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. Signed URLs, mime/size checks, PII-tagged storage, and privacy notice in review.

faq.question: Do you offer no win, no fee?
faq.answer: Where applicable and compliant. Check the hero/footer and pricing for current offers.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple 4-step process to get your compensation

step1.title: Submit Your Claim
step1.description: Fill out our simple form with your incident details and upload any evidence.

step2.title: Free Evaluation
step2.description: Our experts review your case within 24 hours and assess your chances.

step3.title: We Handle Everything
step3.description: We negotiate with insurers and opposing parties on your behalf.

step4.title: Get Compensated
step4.description: Receive your payout. We only charge if you win — No Win, No Fee.
